instruction: Summarize the main findings of the study.
output: The study found that the performance heterogeneity of green and brown stocks declined over time, with a dip in early 2020 due to the COVID-19 pandemic. The market crash in early 2020 led to the lowest performance heterogeneity in both universes. The study also found that sustainable investing has become more challenging for investment managers to differentiate themselves from their peers.
